title: How to change recommended items
body:
Hey all,
 
Just got back into League. How do i change what shows up in my Recommended items? I remember there used to be a way to customize that, but i can't figure out how now. 

Thanks!

replies.body:
Ahhck, you've caught us at an awkward time, to be honest! @_@

Right now we're updating the Item Sets tool for the new client, so currently we can't make any changes to them. Right now the system is in testing on the PBE, but keep an eye on Patch Notes and news updates for when it returns. Shouldn't be too much longer I imagine! ^u^
